title: Dante - The Divine Comedy (5 versions) (epub, mobi)
description:
Five modern version of Dante's The Divine Comedy in epub and mobi formats, from retail sources.

Includes all the formats and editions I have: some are single volume collections of the three parts of the Comedy; some are separate volumes for each; some are both.

John Ciardi (3+1)
Robert & Jean Hollander (3)
Clive James (1)
Robin Kirkpatrick (3+1)
Mark Musa (1)

Mark Musa's translation is part of a larger volume, The Portable Dante, which also includes his version of Vita Nuova. A pdf (scanned) version of Musa's translation can be found here: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8869404

In addition, this torrent includes Anthony Esolen's version of Paradise only.

-----

Many thanks to the original uploaders!
